name: Be The Bridge
description:
This is a game, where you have to use the armor of your core as a bridge or stair, to get to the goal of the level.

You can discard parts of your armor by pressing spacebar.

By using Drag n‘ drop you can place the pieces of armor, but only in the currently visible field of view.

You can't move any of the pieces around whilst you stand on one.

The field of view gets progressively smaller the more prices of your armor you lose.

Currently only two levels exist for which you'll need about 1-2 minutes if you have a good run.

Everything you see was made by myself .

I really hope you like the game or rather the game idea .

@codesity
